Package eu.mondo.mondix.live

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IChangeAwareMondixInstance
    Base relations published by a change-aware Mondix indexer instance may be IChangeAwareMondixRelations.
    IChangeAwareMondixRelation
    Change-aware guarantees to the Mondix relation concept.
    IChangeCallback
    A callback interface for live query instances to deliver information about their changes.
    IChangeCallbackDirect<Row>
    A callback interface for an ILiveQueryInstanceDirect to deliver information about query result changes.
    IConsistencyCallback
    A callback interface for change-aware mondix instances to notify that they are in a consistent state.
    ILiveQueryInstance
    A query instance that can deliver live info about its changes through callbacks.
    ILiveQueryInstanceDirect<Row>
    A live query instance that exposes its tuples through a direct interface.
